metadata.title: CVE-2022-48798 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  s390/cio: verify the driver availability for path_event call  If no driver is attached to a device or the driver does not provide the path_event function, an FCES path-event on this device could end up in a kernel-panic. Verify the driver availability before the path_event function call.
